name: Defiled Survivors: Prologue
description:
This is the free version of Defiled Survivors, a medieval themed, action roguelite game that challenges you to defeat thousands of enemies and bosses in order to progress through levels. As a player, you can choose from different characters, each with their own attributes and play styles. To enhance your character's abilities, you can purchase upgrades, runes, and companions.

The game requires you to move around the map, searching for treasures and leveling up to improve your chances of survival. As you progress through the levels, the difficulty increases, and you'll face tougher enemies and bosses.

The free version of the game provides a taste of what Defiled Survivors has to offer, but some features and assets may be limited or unavailable compared to the full version of the game. However, even with these limitations, players can still experience the core gameplay mechanics and enjoy the challenge of battling their way through hordes of enemies.








Content in prologue:
  • Two characters
  • Bunch of active & passive skills
  • 1 level

Controls:
Supports mouse, keyboard, controller.
